lab6.Topping

    • Uses of Topping in lab6

      Methods in lab6 that return Topping 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Topping Topping.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Topping[] Topping.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in lab6 with parameters of type Topping 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Pizza.addTopping(Topping t)
      allows toppings to be added to the pizza by passing in Topping t
      boolean Pizza.removeTopping(Topping t)
      allows a specific topping, t(Topping), to be completely removed from the pizza and returns true if it was on the pizza and false if it was not
